header.title: Command Playbook
header.subtitle: The Artisan OS Guide
header.description: We handle the rest, so you can focus on making.

intro_box.title: The Brain of Your Studio
intro_box.description: The Command Center is for everything except physical production. Treat it like a real assistant: say what happened, what you need, or what a customer asked â€” we organize it into Orders, Operations Log, and CS Master so you stay in control without the busywork.

orders.title: Orders & Stock
orders.subtitle: Seamless Inventory Flow
orders.description: Quickly register products and track sales to keep inventory accurate.
orders.example_1: Register 'Blue Ceramic Mug' with 50 units. Code: MUG-001.

operations.title: Operations Log
operations.subtitle: Your Internal Business Diary
operations.description: Keep internal notes, B2B requests, and production reminders separate from customer inquiries.
operations.example_1: Record: E-mart requested 100 additional white mugs.
operations.example_2: Note: Check fabric stock at Dongdaemun tomorrow.

marketing.title: Marketing
marketing.subtitle: Localized Global Growth
marketing.description: Generate optimized content for X, Instagram, TikTok, and Facebook. Supports EN, JP, CN, and KR with natural, localized phrasing and high-performing hashtags.

cs.title: CS Master
cs.subtitle: Intelligent Customer Relations
cs.description: Log and track customer inquiries through stages (Open, Waiting, In Progress).
cs.example_1: Mijong is asking for a delivery update on her shadow jacket.
cs.example_2: James complained about the stitching on the pink pants.

left_panel.title: Why PUMWI
left_panel.subtitle: A platform for artists who create with their best effort and consumers who understand that true value
left_panel.feature1_desc: Only artists who pass PUMWI's rigorous internal screening can showcase their work. We maintain a high standard of quality and trust.
left_panel.feature2_desc: We designed our internal systems around artists so they can focus entirely on creation.
left_panel.feature3_desc: Artists' philosophy and process naturally flow into their work and connect with consumers who understand that value.
